# ![](../../assets/ModernUI_ProgressBar48x48.png) ModernUI_ProgressBarPlus

The ModernUI_ProgressBar is a **GDI+** progress bar control like the standard win32 progress bar control, except it provides ease of use and more customizable features, like color of the progress fill, the progress unfilled area and border. 

[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/ModernUI-x86-blue.svg?style=flat-square&colorB=6DA4F8&logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://github.com/mrfearless/ModernUI/releases) [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/Assembler-MASM%206.14.8444-brightgreen.svg?style=flat-square&logo=visual-studio-code&logoColor=white&colorB=C9931E)](http://www.masm32.com/download.htm) [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/RadASM%20-v2.2.2.x%20-red.svg?style=flat-square&colorB=C94C1E&logo=data:image/png;base64,)](http://www.softpedia.com/get/Programming/File-Editors/RadASM.shtml) ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/Win32%20API-Custom%20Control-blue.svg?style=flat-square&logo=windows&logoColor=white) 

For the x64 version of the ModernUI_ProgressBarPlus control, visit [here](https://github.com/mrfearless/ModernUI64/tree/master/Controls/ModernUI_ProgressBarPlus).


## Setup ModernUI_ProgressBarPlus

* Download the latest version of the ModernUI_ProgressBarPlus and extract the files. The latest release can be found via the [releases](https://github.com/mrfearless/ModernUI/releases) section of this Github repository or from the downloads section below.
* Copy the `ModernUI_ProgressBarPlus.inc` file to your `masm32\include` folder (or wherever your includes are located)
* Copy the `ModernUI_ProgressBarPlus.lib` file to your `masm32\lib` folder (or wherever your libraries are located)
* Add the main ModernUI library to your project (if you haven't done so already):
```assembly
include ModernUI.inc
includelib ModernUI.lib
```
* Add the ModernUI_ProgressBarPlus control to your project:
```assembly
include ModernUI_ProgressBarPlus.inc
includelib ModernUI_ProgressBarPlus.lib
```


## ModernUI_ProgressBarPlus API Help

Documentation is available for the ModernUI_ProgressBarPlus functions, styles and properties used by the control on the wiki: [ModernUI_ProgressBarPlus Control](https://github.com/mrfearless/ModernUI/wiki/ModernUI_ProgressBarPlus-Control)

## ModernUI_ProgressBarPlus Downloads
- Release: [ModernUI_ProgressBarPlus.zip](https://github.com/mrfearless/ModernUI/blob/master/Release/ModernUI_ProgressBarPlus.zip?raw=true)
- Source: [ModernUI_ProgressBarPlus_Source.zip](https://github.com/mrfearless/ModernUI/blob/master/Release/ModernUI_ProgressBarPlus_Source.zip?raw=true)
